title: Usage - Sc.exe - Any except w32time
query: process_name:sc.exe (-cmdline:"C:\Windows\system32\sc.exe start wuauserv" OR -cmdline:"C:\Windows\system32\sc.exe start w32time task_started") -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Network Connections to Non-private networks - Unsigned binaries
query: netconn_count:[1 TO *] AND -digsig_result:signed AND (ipaddr:[0.0.0.0 to 9.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[11.0.0.0 to 100.63.255.255] OR ipaddr:[100.128.0.0 to 127.0.0.0] OR ipaddr:[127.0.0.2 to 127.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[128.0.0.0 to 172.15.255.255] OR ipaddr:[172.32.0.0 to 191.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[193.0.0.0 to 192.167.255.255] OR ipaddr:[192.169.0.0 to 198.17.255.255] OR ipaddr:[198.20.0.0 to 255.255.255.255])  AND os_type:windows -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Usage - cmd.exe - Non-std path
query: file_desc:"windows command processor" AND -path:windows\system32\cmd.exe AND -path:windows\syswow64\cmd.exe -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Execution - Cmd.exe - unusual parent
query: childproc_name:cmd.exe AND (parent_name:iexplore.exe OR parent_name:firefox.exe OR parent_name:chrome.exe OR parent_name:acrord32.exe OR parent_name:java.exe OR parent_name:javaw.exe OR parent_name:*flash*) -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Execution - Svchost running under an unusual user context
query: process_name:svchost.exe AND (-username:SYSTEM OR -username:"NETWORK SERVICE" OR -username:"LOCAL SERVICE") -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Zeus Dropper - Svchost from unsigned parent
Execution - Adobe launching unsigned binary
query: parent_name:acrord32.exe -digsig_publisher:"Adobe Systems, Incorporated" AND os_type:windows -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Usage - non-gui registry editor reg.exe - Any
Locky Ransomware
query: regmod:"\Software\Locky" OR (childproc_name:notepad.exe and childproc_name:vssadmin.exe) OR cmdline:_Locky_recover_instructions.txt OR (process_name:cmd.exe parent_name:winword.exe childproc_name:cscript.exe)
